name: proagent-provrag
description: Provectus provrag RAG framework plugin -- scaffold, customize, and operate provrag projects. Full API reference for @step/@pipeline decorators, data models (Document, Chunk, ScoredChunk), LLM abstractions (BaseEmbedder, BaseLLM), OpenSearch retrieval, S3 storage, Pydantic v2 settings, FastAPI serving, CLI operations, and pipeline customization patterns (PDF ingestion, cross-encoder reranking, hybrid search).
